ACKNOWLEDGMENTS

This project was developed with the assistance of AI-based tools.

ChatGPT (by OpenAI) and Claude (by Anthropic) were used during development
as programming assistants to help with idea exploration, example code,
debugging, and implementation discussion.

These tools did not author this software and claim no ownership or rights.
All code integration, architectural decisions, and responsibility for the
final software rest solely with the project author.

This acknowledgment is informational only and does not affect the licensing
terms of this project or any third-party dependencies used herein.
